verses.verse: (For the choir director; on stringed instruments. A Maskil of David, when the) (Ziphites came and said to Saul, "Is not David hiding himself among us?") <S%H3467>Save<s%> me, O <S%H430>God,<s%> by Thy <S%H8034>name,<s%> And <S%H1777>vindicate<s%> me by Thy <S%H1369>power.<s%>
<S%H8085>Hear<s%> my <S%H8605>prayer,<s%> O <S%H430>God;<s%> <S%H238>Give<s%> <S%H238>ear<s%> to the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

For <S%H2114>strangers<s%> have <S%H6965>risen<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, And <S%H6184>violent<s%> <S%H6184>men<s%> have <S%H1245>sought<s%> my <S%H5315>life;<s%> They have not <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> them. <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> is my <S%H5826>helper;<s%> The <S%H136>Lord<s%> is the <S%H5564>sustainer<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
He will <S%H7725>recompense<s%> the <S%H9563>evil<s%> to my <S%H9596>foes;<s%> <S%H6789>Destroy<s%> them in Thy <S%H571>faithfulness.<s%>
<S%H5071>Willingly<s%> I will <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to Thee; I will <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to Thy <S%H8034>name,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> for it is <S%H2896>good.<s%>
For He has <S%H5337>delivered<s%> me from <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6869>trouble;<s%> And my <S%H5869>eye<s%> has <S%H7200>looked<s%> [with satisfaction] upon my <S%H340>enemies.<s%>
